title: IRS Wealth Squad Focuses on Super Rich This Tax Season (Audio)
itunes:title: IRS Wealth Squad Focuses on Super Rich This Tax Season (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Cory Stigile, a lawyer at Hochman, Salkin, Rettig, Toscher & Perez, discusses why the IRS is focusing on America’s wealthy this tax season. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
